ago.description: Конечная часть фразы N минут/часов назад

appDescription.message: New approach of working with your contacts and correspondence in VK.com / VKontakte social network

appUpdated.message: %appname% app has been updated to version %appversion%. Click this notification to open the app's window.

birthday.description: его-ее заменится на что-то одно во всплывающем окне

correspondence.description: Кнопка, отображающаяся вверху приложения. Контекст - контакты и переписка

dayAndTimeSeparator.description: Разделитель даты и времени, например 20 янв 2010 в 10:43

deleteMessageForever.message: Message will be deleted and you won't be able to restore it. Continue?

fileUploadFailed.message: We couldn't host %filename% on VK server. Try to upload this file to another file hosting (dropbox.com, box.net, ...) and insert the link to it in your message.

fileUploadRejected.message: VK.com rejected to host %filename% on its server. Try to upload this file to another file hosting (dropbox.com, box.net, ...) and insert the link to it in your message.

firstInstallText.message: Now you should |grant access| to your data on VK.com
firstInstallText.description: Текст внутри символов || преобразуется в ссылку

getUploadDataFromServer.message: Fetching the data needed for upload of %filename%

hoursAgo.description: Варианты слова час: 1 час назад, 2 часа назад, 10 часов назад

launcherNotificationMessage.message: Google "VK Offline launcher" extension in Chrome Web Store!

likeIconTitle.message: Spread the word about %appname% app. Like and repost a piece of information about the app so your friends can see it

listenAppInstall.message: Explore %artist% best tracks without opening VK site

messagePluralForms.description: Варианты слова сообщение: 1 сообщение, 2 сообщения, 10 сообщений

minutesAgo.description: Варианты слова минута: 1 минуту назад, 2 минуты назад, 10 минут назад

monthesCut.description: Короткие имена месяцев, используемые в формате 20 янв 2010

notificationBeforeAccountDelete.message: Your contacts and correspondence will be cleared. Proceed?

notificationsShow.message: show until user closes them manually

participantMe.description: Фраза, которая обозначает вас в переписке, например Витя, Катя и Вы

saveUploadedData.message: Saving information about the uploaded data

settingsDebugMore.message: Log errors, warnings and system notifications

settingsDeleteUserEverything.message: Delete contact's data and correspondence on your local computer + flush correspondence and remove from friends list on VK.com

settingsDeleteUserLocal.message: Delete contact's data and correspondence on your local computer

settingsDeleteUserServer.message: Delete contact's data and correspondence on your local computer + flush correspondence on VK.com

settingsShowWhenVK.message: Show notifications about the new messages when VK tab is opened

settingsShowBirthdayNotifications.message: Show notifications about your friends' birthday coming

showMoreInfoAboutContactOrMessage.description: Текст, который появляется при наведении на стрелку напротив контакта или сообщения

tourStep1Description.message: You can always find the needed contact's data or a message when the internet connection is down or unstable. The app keeps your contacts data and correspondence synchronized during its work for this purpose.|Don't worry about your internet connection status - you contacts' phones and friends' birthdays will always be available.

tourStep2Description.message: The app will notify you about the new incoming message or a birthday of your friend even if all Google Chrome windows are closed. Background pages feature is used for this purpose and it allows you to get information about the new messages and events immediately.|Do your business and don't worry about the new messages.

tourStep2Title.message: The app works when your browser is closed

tourStep3Description.message: This feature works exactly as Google Multiple Sign-in: you have one active account and its data is being synchronized until you switch to another account on the settings page of the app.|You can add unlimited number of accounts.

tourStep4Description.message: Yes, you can replace boring messages text typing process with just speaking this text. Google Voice Search technology will recognize your speech and convert it to text.|Soon we plan to implement video- and audiomessages in the app which won't need third-party plugins like Flash or Silverlight.

tourStep4SmallDescription.message: You can get closer to the future by clicking the links behind and starring the issues there. This will let Chromium developers know that many people are waiting for this feature to appear in the browser.

tourStep4Title.message: Type messages text by speaking it

tourStep5Description.message: Important messages which are easy to find, deleting messages and their restoring, your own tags and drafts - %appname% has it! We've combined simplicity and convenience of VK chats with the common features of any E-mail app.

tourStep5Title.message: Well-known features from E-mail correspondance are now in the app

tourStep6Description.message: All data is stored on your computer. This means that your contacts, tags and inbox messages stay still on your computer and can't be sent anywhere.|When you install an app Chrome Web Store asks your permission for the app to use *.vk.com and *.userapi.com - these sites are used to synchronize your data.

writesMessageToYou.message: is writing a message to you

chromeAppIsBroken.message: It seems like app's version detecting feature is missing in your browser. Try to update it to the latest version.

tokenUpdatedInsteadOfAccountAdd.message: You wanted to add a new account but you are authorized as %fio% on VK.com right now. Authorize on VK.com with the needed user/password and add acount in the app after this.

tokenAddedInsteadOfUpdate.message: You wanted to update access token for account but you are authorized as ID%id% on VK.com right now. Would you like to synchronize contacts and correspondence of this account with its data on VK.com?

tokenUpdatedForWrongUser.message: You wanted to update access token for account but you are authorized as %fio% on VK.com right now. Authorize on VK.com with the needed user/password and update access token in the app after this.

accessDeniedWhenSendingMessage.message: You are now allowed to send messages. This can happen because the user who you write message to has limited the number of people who can write messages to him/her. If you are sure this is not the actual situation, open settings page and update your account's access token for VK.com. After this try to send the message again.

appWontWorkWithoutAccessGranted.message: %appname% app won't work if you don't grant access to your data on VK.com.

appWontWorkDueSecurityBreach.message: You have connected from completely new IP-address so now you should |confirm your phone number| on VK.com to proceed.
appWontWorkDueSecurityBreach.description: Текст внутри символов | превратится в ссылку

pressHereIfSyncHangs.message: If sync process hangs out |press this button|

backendIsLoading.message: Please wait while the background page of the app is loading...

settingsAttachGeolocation.message: Attach your geolocation to sent messages

recepientTo.description: Слово, которое пишется перед адресатом сообщения. Например 'To: Dmitry Sorin'
